title: Error Reports
body: I've been getting a lot of errors during champion select and am forced to dodge because I cannot choose a champion. It always says "Retrieving Data From Server" and then at the very end of that, It says "Unknown Error, an unknown error has occured, we sent a report.." and I have to click 'close' around 15 times to get through all of the "unknown error" pages that showed up. I was wondering if there was a way to send you all these reports so I could find a solution to this? Thank you.

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs that interact with League?  They may be causing issues like this and will cause you to crash out.  If you have any running like play.tv, lolrecorder, etc remove them.  Let me know if that helps!
I used to have play.tv but I recently uninstalled it, besides that the only other programs I have open at the time are curse and sometimes a browser (google chrome) Is there anything else I could do?
